message.entry: .NET is loaded. To change the environment, restart MATLAB then call dotnetenv.
Command option must be framework or core.
The 'framework' option is only supported on Microsoft Windows. Use the 'core' option on this platform.
NETEnvironment object not loaded. Saving (serializing) NETEnvironment into a MAT-file is not supported.
Frameworks must be a string or string array.
The Version and Frameworks name-value pairs are unsupported for .NET Framework.
